com.lightattachment
Class MailManager

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.lightattachment.MailManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MailManager
extends java.lang.Thread

Distribute the messages to the right LightAttachment's component. It receives messages from the StreamedMailParser instance via the push methods, send them to the AttachmentSaver instance, and launch a SMTPPostfixOutputConnector instance for each message to send back.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

selectOutput

public SMTPPostfixOutputConnector selectOutput()
                                        throws java.net.SocketException,
                                               java.io.IOException
Select a SMTPPostfixOutputConnector in outputPool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else if limit not reached, creates a new thread and return it. Else select the thread with the smaller queue and return it.

Returns:
the selected SMTPPostfixOutputConnector
Throws:
java.net.SocketException
java.io.IOException

selectInject

public MailManager.InjectBackThread selectInject()
Select a InjectBackThread in injectPool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else if limit not reached, creates a new thread and return it. Else select the thread with the smaller queue and return it.

Returns:
the selected InjectBackThread
